author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, should clean a lot of warnings in the step2, visible also in IBs: [log](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/logreader/slc7_amd64_gcc10/CMSSW_12_4_X_2022-05-04-2300/pyRelValMatrixLogs/run/138.4_PromptCollisions+RunMinimumBias2021+ALCARECOPROMPTR3+HARVESTDPROMPTR3/step2_PromptCollisions+RunMinimumBias2021+ALCARECOPROMPTR3+HARVESTDPROMPTR3.log#/106-165)
Suggested fix at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37670#issuecomment-1116440559
The wf was added by @francescobrivio in PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36133

#### PR validation:

Run `runTheMatrix.py -l 138.4` and do not observe anymore missing products warnings.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: don't run HLT DQM monitoring in wf 138.4
